name: Crowdfund Films
overview:
Crowdfund Films produces entertainment for broad-based, mainstream audiences, via film, television, and transmedia formats.

Working capital is derived primarily from crowdfunding from Kickstarter.com & IndieGoGo.com campaigns, augmented by Federal SBA programs, and private funding from its founder.

Currently Crowdfund Films and its transmedia subsidiary Crowdfund Film & Media, has the interactive web series “The Hitman’s Journal” & “So Tell Me A Story” along with feature films “Backseat Driver” and “A Cross To Bear” in active development.
